alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:17PM CDT until May 16 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... West central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 216 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gonzalez, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ferry Pass, Ensley, Gonzalez, Pace, Molino, Pea Ridge and Floridatown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
